content.icerik: Daily Care for Beautiful Hands Blended with anti-oxidant vegetal extracts, Shea nut butter, D-panthenol and Glycerin, this active hand cream nourishes and offers intense hydration to dry hands. Enriched with Peptamide-6, a skin-firming hexopeptide, it strengthens the skin, elasticity improves. This softening and surface smoothing active hand cream provides a silky look by giving a sensation of comfort. Apply onto clean and dry hands as often as needed.
